thread.section_title: Executive Hotel LeSoleil - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location and Service
thread.title_full: Great Location and Service - Review of Executive Hotel LeSoleil, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: sandralicc63
title: Great Location and Service
text:
Lovely Hotel , in a great location.
Walking distance to Times Square, Bryant Park and Madison Square Gardens.
Beds were comfortable and rooms clean
Staff were excellent and very helpful. Close to a number of eating places
Would definitely stay here again
Room Tip: Some of the corner suites are larger See more room tips
